full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 35 of 247 163 LBUVMAX2 Visoski - direct
1 Q. Are these both fair and accurate depictions of that aircraft?
2 A. Yes, they are.
3 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, the government offers both of these exhibits in evidence.
4 MR. EVERDELL: No objection.
5 THE COURT: Without objection, Government 311, 312 are admitted, and you may accomplish.
6 (Government's Exhibits 311, 312 received in evidence)
7 MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor.
8 You can take those down. Thank you, Ms. Drescher.
9 Q. Mr. Visoski, about how many helicopters do you remember Mr. Epstein owning between 1994 and 2004?
10 A. During that time frame, up until 2004, it was probably the first helicopter he purchased, one helicopter.
11 Q. And when did Mr. Epstein purchase that helicopter?
12 A. Give or take a year, probably the year 2000, '99 to 2000.
13 MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, would you please pull up Government Exhibits 344 and 345 for the witness, the Court, and the parties.
14 Q. Mr. Visoski, do you recognize these?
15 A. Yes, I do.
16 Q. What are they?
17 A. That is a photo of Mr. Epstein's first helicopter he purchased.
18 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017397
